text: Yardım (, literally "help, assistance, aid") is a Turkish surname and may refer to: * Ahmet Cemil Yardım (1893–1966), Turkish politician * Barbaros Yardım (born 1950), Turkish former footballer * Fahri Yardım (born 1980), Turkish-German actor * Mehmet Nuri Yardım (born 1960), Turkish journalist * Ümit Yardım (born 1961), Turkish diplomat ==References== Category:Turkish- language surnames
title: Yardım (surname)
